attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.review: We should have all known by the description â€œjoin trumps armyâ€ as a turn off. This app is used to spread false information such as â€œKeep America greatâ€. America cannot be great until trump is no longer president and his app is a representation of that. The founder of this app is racist, sexist, homophobic, a rapist and so much more. He views his election as a way to create an army, which is directly turning U.S citizens against each other. Which is a declaration of war. The creator and the app both spread false information in order to harm citizens and must be stopped as soon as we can. The least the App Store can to is help us stop the spread of false information that is used to harm others.
attributes.title: Worst App out there

attributes.review: I hardly have any apps on my phone due to a lack of storage. When i made some space for this app, the day i downloaded i began receiving alerts from other social medias that my accounts were being logged in to from locations all around the world. Do NOT download this app unless you want your phone to be HACKED!!!!!!!!!! I had to call all of the customer service representatives to let them know that wasn't me signing in and to change my passwords... Even got a notification that my bank was being signed on toğŸ˜ ğŸ˜ ğŸ˜ . Never buy this app. Save yourself a whole lot of time and sanity. I would give this app NO STARS if I could.
